name: Deep Breaths (Poioioio)
description:
I was really lucky when I got this internship in a deep sea science observatory. Or so I thought. In the end, those guys are bullies just like everyone else. And here I am scrubbing the dirt off that extraordinary O2 generator with a toothbrush …

Get in your scuba diving suit, put the bottles on your back, grab your toothbrush. Take control of an intern who has to clean stuff up in deep sea.

Keyboard controls :

  • Control your lungs with E and Space.
  • Use arrows to palm in ANY direction.
  • Press R to interact with stuff. (Mostly clean them.)

[Note for LD rating purpose, given I couldn't start before saturday evening, I'll continue working on it on tuesday. Anyway this is V1, any change made after this will be logged here.]
